about_the_game:
Player A Wei is a member of sky sword agency，he is dead at a recure mission accidently.As the help of sky sword agency's founder Aoligei,be revived.
The target to revive him,also is to execute the recure mission,he will be revived unlimted before mission over.
A Wei executes the recure mission again and again...

In this game,you can use some skills to kill the anemy.the game has 8 game turn to play.

In the last turn,you only can though the game in short time.

You can jump and run in this game.

You can meet human skeleton and Goblin.

If you dead,you can revive in this turn.

You also can get hp item to enhance your hp.

After you finished all turn,you can save the princess.

Game's feature not only from left to right to play,but also from right to left,from up to down,from down to up.

It's a pixel game.you can use multi skills with weapon of gun.

All spirites split to move pics with paper doll.

you can safely to though the games with no big boss,easy to play!

you can play and over final chapter from level 1 swiftly~

It's a free game,and creator by indle gamer of one man.

Button——
up:W down:S left:A right:D jump:J run:K shoot:L
support 2 level jump

Player A Wei is a member of sky sword agency，he is dead at a recure mission accidently.As the help of sky sword agency's founder Aoligei,be revived.
The target to revive him,also is to execute the recure mission,he will be revived unlimted before mission over.
A Wei executes the recure mission again and again...

In this game,you can use some skills to kill the anemy.the game has 8 game turn to play.

You also can get hp item to enhance your hp.

After you finished all turn,you can save the princess.

It's a pixel game.you can use multi skills with weapon of gun.

All spirites split to move pics with paper doll.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: geforce 440
  • Storage: 63 MB available space
